tripleplay.ui
Class ValueLabel

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.ui.Element<T>
      tripleplay.ui.Widget<T>
          tripleplay.ui.TextWidget<ValueLabel>
              tripleplay.ui.ValueLabel

public class ValueLabel
extends TextWidget<ValueLabel>

A label that displays a ValueView. If you already have the contents of the label in a reactive value, you can use this to simply display it rather than using a stock Label which requires manually connecting your value to the label's value. This label does not support icons. If you want an icon and changing text, you'll have to manually wire up a Label.
